name: 2D Movement Test Build
description:
EVERYTHING IN THIS BUILD IS SUBJECT TO CHANGE, THE ART IS PLACEHOLDER AND UI AND EFFECTS ARE FOR TESTING ONLY.

This is a test build of 2D movement I will use in my game Entangled.

Includes: Variable jump height, aerial and ground movement, and a tool board for trying new settings.

The particle trail is to help the user visualize the movement trail in the game.
